attributes.additional_details: Watch his many streams and interviews to make your own mind up.
attributes.background: An English man, was targeted unreasonably, for reporting, already public knowledge . And charged and convicted of contempt of Court.  There was 10000 of us watching his live stream . He has done no wrong . The only contempt , is the contempt our government holds against us.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do. Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking for a specific change in the contempt of court laws, if that’s what you’d like to happen.
